name: 10K To Impact
description:
Game made by Smorg and Magicanz.

Music made by gladhet.

Save the earth by bringing a water filled asteroid to the surface! But beware, if it gets too hot or springs too many leaks, the water might not be there when you land!

A and D to move, W or S to change between moving character and rotating asteroid, Mouse1 to shoot and E to fix leaks.
